result.execSummary:
The defendant Johnny A Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court grants payment plan of $50 / month beginning July 1, 2016. Failure to pay will result in one day in jail for every $25 outstanding.
Defendant to submit DNA sample within 30 days.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)

records.addlTxt: Per Dispatch, subject posted cond at New Berlin PD on commitment order.
Debt has been certified to WI DOR tax intercept program.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Johnny A Jones in court.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Plea questionnaire filed. Court examines defendant, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty. Court renders sentence.
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 9, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Johnny A Jones in court.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant still working to obtain license. State does not oppose adjournment. If defendant is not ready by next date, defendant to file written request at least one week before. If adjourned again, that will be final adjournment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 9, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Off the record. Defendant Johnny A Jones in court.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin. State advises will be ready for dispo in April. Case adjourned for dispo.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Johnny A Jones in court.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant advises court he missed pretrial conference in January. State is willing to set one more pretrial date. Pretrial conference scheduled for 02/19/16. Case adjourned for dispo.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 8, 2016 at 11:00 am.
w/conditions: no operation of a motor vehicle w/o license

Defendant Johnny A Jones in court.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant files waiver of right to attorney. Court examines defendant and accepts said waiver. Defendant pleads not guilty. State requests signature bond with conditions. Pretrial scheduled 12/18/15. Further proceedings scheduled for February 2, 2016 at 10:00 am.
